reviews.review: Good Game!
Super jeux . J'ai trop kiffer

Growing up with this game on the PlayStation, and playing it again on the computer... I regret that I haven't put much time into it. 

I don't know what I can say about this game that hasn't been iterated already. 

- The story will leave you with several different emotions over the course of the game, ranging from joyful and adventurous, to vengeful and enraged. On top of that, there are constant moments in the game that can become rather comedic, directly or indirectly, and really make the game that much more enjoyable. It keeps your spirits up, and legitimately allows you to forget that your character's life is on the line!

- The characters are likable and developed. You know some of these characters from the previous installment, and there still is plenty of room left to develop them. You found a likable villain in the first game, and despite all of those moments of rivalry, betrayal, and demise in the first game, you find respect for them in this game, and like them all the more. Among that, you also have new characters that are always interesting, and when you think you begin to have an understanding of the character, the story throws a curveball, and they're trying to kill you to pursue what they believe is right.

- The audio... oh man. The voice acting is incredible in this game. Ellen McLain can still provide an incredible performance as her returning character. I don't know much about Stephen Merchant, but his performance makes me want to look more into his other material. Dee Bradley Baker even takes part in this game, voicing some of the robots. Dee Bradley Baker. The king of voicing animals and making noises.

And then... J.K. Simmons. I'm at a loss of what to say about his performance, it's that good. He allows his character to be enjoyable, have comedic moments, be hilariously eccentric, and still allow the character to be one of the most believable characters I've seen in recent times. And yes, I am a Gravity Falls fan. After his performance as Ford, I would play this game over again just to hear that stunning voice of his. 

In terms of other audio, the soundtrack is incredible, really giving your actions in the game that extra energy and motivation. However, it's the sound effects that really finalize this game and fill in that final piece to create a truly iconic game. 

I cannot praise this game enough. I would strongly urge other people that, if they were looking into buying a game, this would be at the very top of my recommendations. This is a must-play for players of any genre.

Portal 2 - шикарное продолжение первой части,  с учётом ошибок и недостатков предыдущей игры серии, хотя о чем я говорю?  Какие недостатки?))  
Единственный минус - игра кажется слишком короткой, но это можно восполнить в дальнейшем кооперативе, ведь разработчики предоставили ещё целую серию испытаний для двух очаровательных роботов, за что им отдельное спасибо, а если и они покажутся простыми можно решать головоломки созданные верными фанатами, либо делать их самому.
А эта финальная песня туррелей, она прямо в душу проникает... Я её теперь никогда не забуду)) 

P.S. Valve, я ни на что не намекаю, но все ждут третью часть)

One of the best sequels that I've ever played. Why's that? Well, the game is longer than the first one, still has an awesome atmosphere and better graphics, the soundtrack is simply neat and the coop adds an extra touch of replay value that should definitely be respected. Overall, there's not much to say... I've watched this video before saying that Valve stopped making games after they've figured out how to make money. Either way, I really hope that they can keep doing it, because there's no doubt that they're awesome at it. Just to finish, if life gives you lemons... Play Portal 2.
This game is the perfect mix of a great story, and a first person puzzle game.

Download game thinking it will be easy enough, get through the first few tests alright, find a hard one and spend 30 minutes figuring out what to do, then find out you're just stupid. Besides that excellent game, one of the best games I've played.

This was the game that got me into Steam, so it means much to me.

First of all, this game i the sequel to portal still alive, which I would also reccommend because it's cheap and fun.

The game itself is pretty short, but if you take the time to explore the levels, you may find an easter egg or an incredibly funny piece of dialogue that you've previously missed. The game is funny, challenging and has an amazing story that doesn't get thrown in your face like you're a baby. You have to at least think a little to figure it out. But that's what this game is all about.
This has been it for the game itself.

Then it comes to why the pc version is greater. You can create your own test chambers now. Either with the easy to use included level editor or whatever advanced creators use, hammer I think.

All of that for 20 euros, Otherwise just wait for either the winter sale, the exploration sale, or the summer sale because it will be a garantueed discount.

This is one of the best games ever made. It is fun, imaginative, has cool mechanics I've never seen in any other game, has great characters, I could go on and on about how good this game is.
100/10

verryy nicce

Easily in my top 2-3 games of all time. I'm a lover of humor, a good storyline, and puzzles. This game does them all absolutely superbly. Amazing voice acting, as well.

You don't need to have played the first Portal to enjoy this, but you will definitely enjoy it MORE if you did. And really, you're going to enjoy both of them, so why not play both? This one is at least twice as good as the first Portal, though -- for me. Not only does it introduce new puzzle elements and devices, but the humor is a good combination of the dry, sarcastic humor from the first game and a bit more of an obvious, British-type humor. And the storyline is much more compelling.

If you're one of the 15 gamers left on the planet that hasn't played Portal 2, do yourself a favor and play it now. You will NOT be disappointed!

best game i've ever played!

很久没有这种感觉，一个游戏能带给我这么多正面的情绪
喜欢这种可以慢慢思考的解谜游戏
感觉不恐怖 不诡异 不血腥 不急迫（仅极少数剧情比较急迫）
感觉逻辑很清晰，也不是很难
不需要长时间练习手速、瞄准、走位、和临场反应
只要慢慢的思考、探索，就能找到通关的方法
我不否认我懒且手残还有临场反应极差
不过只要说明我不脑残不就好了？（额……）
            
每次通关真的是成就感满满，真的是一种极好的体验
那种通关后你能清晰的得知自己走对路、用对方法的快感（不像一代，每次通关后，依旧觉得哪里不对似的）
真是欲罢不能
          
剧情很有意思，不是仅生硬单调的闯关，听到他们的对话，我经常都忍不住笑着回嘴
结局也很美好，那片金灿灿的麦田和那首歌，都让人心情舒畅愉悦
虽然我担心了下主角在荒郊野外该怎么办…………但是这不重要！
重要的是我来这里撰写评论，为了表达我对这款游戏的钟意
和这款游戏带给我的各种美好感觉

医生，我说的都是真的！不要抓我回去好不好！我真的没病！！

Um ótimo jogo de puzzles, divertido e criativo. Não tem como não gostar. No modo cooperativo é ainda melhor!

Quien no quiere jugar un juego con portales, para resolver rompecabezas, en zonas donde casi todo es peligroso
creo que lo mejor de este juego es que te divertiras con algunas bromas que presenta, ademas podras jugar camaras de pruebas que han creado otros jugadores,asi que habra rejugabilidad.
Ademas en esta segunda entrega trae un modo cooperativo(donde tambien puedes jugar camaras de pruebas creadas por otros), donde con un amigo se van a matar a cada rato tirandose portales abajo para tirarte, luego estaran una hora hasta que  puedan resolver una camara de pruebas.

Un juego que te divertira mucho, si no te gusta los puzzles medio complejo este no es tu juego.
 Buena jugabilidad, buenos puzzles que me a hecho ir a por guias por algunas zonas, buenos graficos, buena dificultad en los puzzles, y buena historia si buscas los easter egg de los 2 juegos.
 No tiene mucha duración el juego. 
 El Cooperativo es muy bueno, divertido y de poca duración.
 Nota: 9/10

Great game, the story was great and fantasic gameplay as well. The first portal was a masterpiec, and so is this one. I have played all of single player campaign as well the co-op campaign and all of the official test chambers. A few of the community chambers I have played were good. If you want some good fun, then get this game and you won't regret it.
